short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a buy with Card Kingdom button to scryfall.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Scryfall, a website for searching Magic: The Gathering cards there is no option to buy on Card Kingdom. This extension fixes that!

Works with most cards.
